name: This, Too, Has Passed
description:
These are the last of the good days

Treasure this time

For your world is dying

-

FAQ:

Why the price?
Every month the price is set to the previous month’s approximate average global temperature (historical average plus median anomaly according to the US National Centers For Environmental Information State of the Climate report). If you think this is too much, options to lower the price include but are not limited to: planting trees, reducing car use, organising in protest, voting against fossil fuels, eating the rich and recycling your plastics. Your money is not wasted though, as a minimum of $10 from every sale will go towards planting a New Zealand native tree through treesthatcount.. 

How is this related to the Twitter bot?
Think of this game as a B-side remix to This, Too, Shall Pass. The Twitter bot connects to the main version of this game which is in circulation on a small number of USB keys all around the world.

How do I get the version that’s posting on the bot?
For now, the only way to get that is to be given it by someone who has it. If that version of the game ever does get a public release, I promise that anyone who owns the B-side will get a copy of those for free, but there’s currently no plans to do that in the near future.
